document.full_text: water quality in zhejiang province was returning to normal, officials said, more than two days after a truck collision led to a spill of carbolic acid that tainted drinking water for thousands.
document.title: asia: drinking water in chinese province returning to normal after spill
lines_and_colors: water quality in zhejiang province was returning to normal, officials said, more than two days after a truck collision led to a spill of carbolic acid that tainted drinking water for thousands.
